title: A Christmas Carol (Part 8)
description: The Ghost of Christmas Yet To Come, a hooded, silent figure, takes Scrooge to a group of businessmen who are discussing a man's death and funeral with disdain. Then, the spirit brings him to a pawn shop where Scrooge watches as the man's few earthly possessions, which have been stolen from his deathbed by strangers, are sold without remorse.
